attributes.additional_details: (I did not have enough space to finish writing so i will continue here...) a 5 year ban is not enough, more needs to be done to protect innocent animals from this sick behaviour and i believe there should be heavier punishments on the disturbed people that perform these attacks. SIGN AND SHARE for Justice for Chunky.
attributes.background: Recently a chihuahua dog called Chunky was brutally attacked by thugs & it was one of the worst attacks seen by the RSPCA. Chunky had his neck broken, eyes set on fire, fed drugs and dumped. This is UNACCEPTABLE, the attackers were only banned from keeping animals for 5 years. This is not enough.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.  

If you would like the sentences for crimes against animal to be increased, you might like to sign one or more of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104779
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105764
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106340
